attributes.action: Get the sentences of the three involved in Baby P's murder overturned.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We as a nation are sickened and deeply saddened by the case of Baby P, we think that the lenient sentences that are to be dished out to these cold blooded murderers is plain wrong, 14 years for a life lost so young, Life should mean Life! His life was cut tragically short, why should they be free to carry on theirs after they've 'done their time'?

Please help us get justice for this poor little boy.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
